price: 67. Marka dhibaato idinku taabato badda, waad weydaan kuwaad u yeedhataan (baridaan) Alle maahee. markase uu idinku keeno nabad barriga, waa jeedsataan.  Aadmiguna waa abaal dhac badan yahay.
arabic: وَإِذَا مَسَّكُمُ ٱلضُّرُّ فِي ٱلۡبَحۡرِ ضَلَّ مَن تَدۡعُونَ إِلَّآ إِيَّاهُۖ فَلَمَّا نَجَّىٰكُمۡ إِلَى ٱلۡبَرِّ أَعۡرَضۡتُمۡۚ وَكَانَ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ كَفُورًا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wa-idhā massakumu al-ḍuru fī al-baḥri ḍalla man tadʿūna illā iyyāhu falammā najjākum ilā al-bari aʿraḍtum wakāna al-insānu kafūran
